title: Holding
description: Sometimes holding on, impedes moving on.First comes love, then comes marriage...But before the ceremony could start, Porter's world was knocked off it's axis.He fought for years to break down Asher's walls, to see past her ghosts...but some ghosts may be too hard to fight.Asher knew better than to believe she could keep her past in the past,Keep the filth of who she was, from touching the Prescott family.But as badly as she wants to keep Porter away...she needs his family more.What you see is what you get...And even the most astute eyes can't see the biggest ghost.But sometimes holding on is the only choice you have.Note: This is book two in a duet. Book one, Altercation, MUST be read prior to Holding.
author: Mignon Mykel
